column4: Why is the ubuntu wiki so useless? :( I can never find answers there, that's why I have to bother you all.. I just installed edgy and I want to upgrade to fiesty. What file do i edit, how and where is it?
I know, but I hear it works wonders, so I want to try it
you can try just editing your /etc/apt/sources.list but you'll be better off using the feisty install cd
